properties.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 29 at 5:28AM AKST until March 1 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35
mph.

* WHERE...Yakutat Area.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 AM AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy rain on top of
the new snow will make it difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will change to rain Sunday morning. A
period of freezing rain is possible at the beginning and end of
the event.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM AKST SUNDAY
